#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
typedef struct _node{
    int data;
    _node* next;
    _node* prev;
}node;
typedef struct _list{
    node *head;
    node *tail;
}list;
list circle;
int n,m;
int ans = 0;
void dfs(node* cur,int moves){
    if(cur->data - 1 > m - moves && n - cur->data > m - moves) return;
    if(moves == m){
        if(cur->data == 1) ans++;
        return;
    }
    dfs(cur->next,moves+1);
    dfs(cur->prev,moves+1);
}
int dabiao[32][32] = {{0,2,2,6,10,22,42,86,170,342,682,1366,2730,5462,10922,21846,43690,87382,174762,349526,699050,1398102,2796202,5592406,11184810,22369622,44739242,89478486,178956970,357913942},{0,2,0,8,0,32,0,128,0,512,0,2048,0,8192,0,32768,0,131072,0,524288,0,2097152,0,8388608,0,33554432,0,134217728,0,536870912},{0,2,0,6,2,20,14,70,72,254,330,948,1430,3614,6008,13990,24786,54740,101118,215766,409640,854702,1652090,3396916,6643782,13530350,26667864,53971350,106914242,215492564},{0,2,0,6,0,22,0,86,0,342,0,1366,0,5462,0,21846,0,87382,0,349526,0,1398102,0,5592406,0,22369622,0,89478486,0,357913942},{0,2,0,6,0,20,2,70,18,252,110,924,572,3434,2730,12902,12376,48926,54264,187036,232562,720062,980674,2789164,4086550,10861060,16878420,42484682,69242082,166823430},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,72,0,272,0,1056,0,4160,0,16512,0,65792,0,262656,0,1049600,0,4196352,0,16781312,0,67117056,0,268451840},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,2,252,22,924,156,3432,910,12870,4760,48622,23256,184796,108528,705894,490314,2708204,2163150,10430500,9373652,40313160,40060078,156305070},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,254,0,948,0,3614,0,13990,0,54740,0,215766,0,854702,0,3396916,0,13530350,0,53971350,0,215492564},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,2,924,26,3432,210,12870,1360,48620,7752,184756,40698,705434,201894,2704204,961400,10401250,4440150,40123152,20030010,155172330},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,926,0,3460,0,13110,0,50252,0,194446,0,758100,0,2973350,0,11716252,0,46333566,0,183739940},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,924,2,3432,30,12870,272,48620,1938,184756,11970,705432,67298,2704156,354200,10400602,1776060,40116656,8584290,155118390},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,924,0,3434,0,12902,0,48926,0,187036,0,720062,0,2789164,0,10861060,0,42484682,0,166823430},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,924,0,3432,2,12870,34,48620,342,184756,2660,705432,17710,2704156,106260,10400600,592020,40116600,3121560,155117522},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,924,0,3432,0,12872,0,48656,0,185136,0,708512,0,2725408,0,10532160,0,40870080,0,159189120},{0,2,0,6,0,20,0,70,0,252,0,924,0,3432,0,12870,2,48620,38,184756, int main() {
    freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    cin >> n >> m;
    cout << dabiao[n-3][m-1];
    /*freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
    cout << "{";
    for (n = 3; n <= 30; ++n) {
        cout <<"{";
        for (m = 1; m <= 30; ++m) {
            ans = 0;
            if(n%2 == 0 && m%2 == 1) {cout << 0 << ',';continue;}
            node *n1 = new node;
            node *n2 = new node;
            circle.head = n1;
            circle.tail = n2;
            circle.head->data = 1;
            circle.tail->data = 2;
            circle.head->next = circle.tail;
            circle.tail->next = circle.head;
            circle.head->prev = circle.tail;
            circle.tail->prev = circle.head;
            for (int i = 3; i <= n; ++i) {
                node *child = new node;
                child->data = i;
                circle.tail->next = child;
                child->prev = circle.tail;
                circle.tail = child;
                child->next = circle.head;
                circle.head->prev = child;
            }
            dfs(n1,0);
            delete n1,n2;
            cout << ans << ",";
        }
        cout << "},";
    }
    cout << "}";*/
    return 0;
}
